content: I think that's a great idea. I'll reach out to the jewelry maker and propose the partnership. I'll also make sure to highlight the benefits of sharing a booth and cross-promoting each other's products. I'll let you know how it goes! By the way, I was thinking of offering a special promotion at the craft fair, like a discount for customers who spend a certain amount or a free gift with purchase. Do you have any advice on how to structure the promotion and promote it effectively?
